# Koncile

Koncile is an AI-powered OCR platform that combines advanced recognition technology with large language models to extract and structure data from documents.

## Overview

Koncile offers a SaaS solution for automated document processing. The platform combines a cutting-edge OCR engine with large language models to transform unstructured documents into structured, usable data. Koncile serves multiple industries including accounting, logistics, healthcare, real estate, procurement, and compliance.

The platform provides a user-friendly interface that allows business users to create custom [extraction](../../capabilities/extraction/index.md) models without coding. Documents are processed in 1-2 seconds with confidence scoring for each extracted field. Koncile integrates with ERPs, CRMs, and accounting tools through its API and SDK. The platform performs [OCR](../../capabilities/ocr/index.md) and [classification](../../capabilities/classification/index.md) to transform unstructured documents into structured data.

Founded by Jules R., Tristan Thommen, and Technical Lead Raphael Balbous, Koncile is based in Paris and received funding from Agoranov and Entrepreneurs First. The company holds SOC 2 certification and maintains GDPR compliance.

## Key Features

- **AI-Powered OCR**: Combines optical character recognition with large language models for intelligent data extraction
- **Handwriting Recognition**: Reads handwritten content including prescriptions, signatures, and form entries
- **Table and List Extraction**: Automatically identifies and extracts structured data from tables and lists
- **Document Classification**: Categorizes documents by type automatically
- **Confidence Scoring**: Provides reliability scores for each extracted data point
- **Multilingual Processing**: Supports multiple languages and currencies
- **Intelligent Page Splitting**: Separates multi-page documents automatically
- **Custom Extraction Templates**: No-code interface for defining extraction fields
- **API/SDK Integration**: Connects to existing business systems

## Use Cases

### Invoice and Financial Document Processing

Accounting departments and finance teams use Koncile to automate invoice processing and financial statement analysis. The platform extracts key data including line items, amounts, dates, and vendor information from invoices and receipts. It handles multiple currencies and formats, providing structured output that integrates directly with accounting systems.

### Healthcare Document Management

Healthcare organizations process medical forms, prescriptions, and patient records with Koncile's handwriting recognition capabilities. The system extracts patient information, medication details, and clinical data from handwritten and printed documents. It maintains GDPR compliance and security standards required for sensitive medical information.

### Logistics and Transport Documentation

Logistics companies automate the processing of shipping documents, bills of lading, and customs forms. Koncile extracts shipment details, tracking numbers, and delivery information from various document formats. The platform handles both structured forms and unstructured transport documents.

## Technical Specifications

| Feature | Specification |
|---------|---------------|
| Core Technology | OCR, Large Language Models (LLMs) |
| Recognition Capabilities | Printed text, handwriting, tables, lists |
| Supported Formats | PDF, images (various formats) |
| Processing Speed | 1-2 seconds per document |
| Language Support | Multilingual, multiple currencies |
| Integration | REST API, SDK |
| Deployment | Cloud-based SaaS |
| Security Certifications | SOC 2, GDPR compliant |
| Data Policy | No training on customer data |
| Pricing Model | Credit-based, flexible subscriptions by volume |
| Free Trial | 20 free credits for new users |

## Getting Started

1. **Sign Up**: Create an account at www.koncile.ai and receive 20 free credits
2. **Define Fields**: Use the no-code interface to specify data fields for extraction
3. **Process Documents**: Upload documents in PDF or image format
4. **Review Results**: Examine extracted data with confidence scores
5. **Integrate**: Connect via API/SDK to your ERP, CRM, or accounting system
